title: AC/DC’s 2025 Tour: How to Get Tickets
description: The trek marks AC/DC's first US outing in nine years. Learn how to get tickets here. AC/DC’s 2025 Tour: How to Get Tickets Jon Hadusek
author: Jon Hadusek
excerpt: AC/DC's 2025 stadium tour marks the band's first North American outing in nine years. Learn how to get sold-out tickets to their upcoming concerts here.
text: AC/DC are hitting the road in 2025 for run of North American stadium shows. The spring trek includes the Australian rock legends’ first US tour dates in nine years — since 2016’s “Rock or Bust Tour” — and follows the band’s UK/European outing in 2024. Get AC/DC Tickets Here Find more details below, including how to get sold-out tickets, and see the full list of tour dates. How Can I Buy Tickets to AC/DC’s 2025 North American Stadium Tour? Tickets for AC/DC’s 2025 stadium tour are now on sale. Fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out dates via StubHub, where your purchase is 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s Fan Protect program. If you’re planning a trip to catch AC/DC in concert, you can save up to 15% off on travel and accommodations through Booking.com What Is AC/DC’s Next Tour? AC/DC’s upcoming trek is a 13-date run that includes 12 stateside concerts and a Canadian date on April 22nd in Vancouver. The outing kicks off on April 10th in Minneapolis and runs through May 28th in Cleveland, with notable stops in Las Vegas and Chicago along the way. It will be AC/DC’s first US trek since 2016’s “Rock or Bust Tour,” which famously saw Axl Rose replace frontman Brian Johnson on a portion of the final US leg after the latter was forced to sit out due to hearing problems. After the tour, AC/DC didn’t play another show until they returned to the stage in October 2023 for a one-off gig at the Power Trip festival in Indio, California. A UK/European tour followed earlier this year. The upcoming run also marks the band’s first North American tour in support of their latest studio album, 2020’s Power Up. The current touring lineup includes Johnson, lead guitarist Angus Young, rhythm guitarist Stevie Young, drummer Matt Laug, and bass player Chris Chaney. Who Is Opening for AC/DC’s Stadium Tour? The Pretty Reckless are returning as direct support after opening for AC/DC’s aforementioned European tour in 2023. Fronted by Taylor Momsen, the New York hard rockers have been actively touring in support of their 2021 album Death by Rock and Roll, having played over 100 shows over the past two years. What Are AC/DC’s 2025 Tour Dates? You can see the full itinerary for AC/DC’s stadium tour below. Pick up tickets here. AC/DC’s 2025 Tour Dates: 04/10 – Minneapolis, MN @ U.S. Bank Stadium * 04/14 – Arlington, TX @ AT&T Stadium * 04/18 – Pasadena, CA @ Rose Bowl * 04/22 – Vancouver, BC @ BC Place * 04/26 – Las Vegas, NV @ Allegiant Stadium * 04/30 – Detroit, MI @ Ford Field * 05/04 – Foxborough, MA @ Gillette Stadium * 05/08 – Pittsburgh, PA @ Acrisure Stadium * 05/12 – Landover, MD @ Northwest Stadium * 05/16 – Tampa, FL @ Raymond James Stadium * 05/20 – Nashville, TN @ Nissan Stadium * 05/24 – Chicago, IL @ Soldier Field * 05/28 – Cleveland, OH @ Huntington Bank Field * * = w/ The Pretty Reckless
html:
AC/DC are hitting the road in 2025 for run of North American stadium shows.

The spring trek includes the Australian rock legends’ first US tour dates in nine years — since 2016’s “Rock or Bust Tour” — and follows the band’s UK/European outing in 2024.

Get AC/DC Tickets Here

Find more details below, including how to get sold-out tickets, and see the full list of tour dates.

How Can I Buy Tickets to AC/DC’s 2025 North American Stadium Tour?

Tickets for AC/DC’s 2025 stadium tour are now on sale. Fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out dates via StubHub, where your purchase is 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s Fan Protect program.

If you’re planning a trip to catch AC/DC in concert, you can save up to 15% off on travel and accommodations through Booking.com

What Is AC/DC’s Next Tour?

AC/DC’s upcoming trek is a 13-date run that includes 12 stateside concerts and a Canadian date on April 22nd in Vancouver. The outing kicks off on April 10th in Minneapolis and runs through May 28th in Cleveland, with notable stops in Las Vegas and Chicago along the way.

It will be AC/DC’s first US trek since 2016’s “Rock or Bust Tour,” which famously saw Axl Rose replace frontman Brian Johnson on a portion of the final US leg after the latter was forced to sit out due to hearing problems. After the tour, AC/DC didn’t play another show until they returned to the stage in October 2023 for a one-off gig at the Power Trip festival in Indio, California. A UK/European tour followed earlier this year.

The upcoming run also marks the band’s first North American tour in support of their latest studio album, 2020’s Power Up. The current touring lineup includes Johnson, lead guitarist Angus Young, rhythm guitarist Stevie Young, drummer Matt Laug, and bass player Chris Chaney.

Who Is Opening for AC/DC’s Stadium Tour?

The Pretty Reckless are returning as direct support after opening for AC/DC’s aforementioned European tour in 2023. Fronted by Taylor Momsen, the New York hard rockers have been actively touring in support of their 2021 album Death by Rock and Roll, having played over 100 shows over the past two years.

What Are AC/DC’s 2025 Tour Dates?

You can see the full itinerary for AC/DC’s stadium tour below. Pick up tickets here.

AC/DC’s 2025 Tour Dates:
04/10 – Minneapolis, MN @ U.S. Bank Stadium *
04/14 – Arlington, TX @ AT&T Stadium *
04/18 – Pasadena, CA @ Rose Bowl *
04/22 – Vancouver, BC @ BC Place *
04/26 – Las Vegas, NV @ Allegiant Stadium *
04/30 – Detroit, MI @ Ford Field *
05/04 – Foxborough, MA @ Gillette Stadium *
05/08 – Pittsburgh, PA @ Acrisure Stadium *
05/12 – Landover, MD @ Northwest Stadium *
05/16 – Tampa, FL @ Raymond James Stadium *
05/20 – Nashville, TN @ Nissan Stadium *
05/24 – Chicago, IL @ Soldier Field *
05/28 – Cleveland, OH @ Huntington Bank Field *

* = w/ The Pretty Reckless
